document_data.name: Swallow Lake
document_data.mainbody: '''Swallow Lake''' was a body of water in the [[Sword Coast North]] where residents of [[Phandalin]] would sometimes go swimming in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/In Volo's Wake|7}}{{Cite adventurers league/In Volo's Wake|15}}
document_data.Geography: The lake lay just south of the [[Sword Mountains]] from Phandalin near the western edge of the [[Crooked Forest]]. The hamlet of [[Halfway]] lay on the lake's eastern shore.
document_data.History: Following the resettlement of Phandalin in the late 15{{th}} century DR, it was not unheard of for residents to head to Swallow Lake for a swim. Even the overprotective [[Sildar Hallwinter]] would allow his teenage daughter, [[Alana Hallwinter]], to go there unsupervised with her friends [[Nedd Angelite]], [[Sasha Flint]], and [[Grace Hardstone]].
